scripts.build: buble --no modules src/stylemodule.js | sed -e 's/export var StyleModule/var StyleModule = exports.StyleModule/' > dist/stylemodule.js; cp src/stylemodule.d.ts dist/
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run build-readme
scripts.build-readme: builddocs --name stylemodule --main src/README.md --format markdown src/*.js > README.md
